data.text: @BillCassidy Kiss his ass some more. By the way he’s primarying you
@BillCassidy He’s a racist fucker and you thank him? That’s just weird, man. He deserves condemnation - not a pat on the back.
@BillCassidy His original intention is the only way portraying the Obama's as apes could be intended. Shame on you to defend him. Maybe his next video he will portray you  as an a$$

@BillCassidy "Thank you?" Nobody gets credit for being wildly, offensively racist. My god, do you have any balls at all? Every one of you sycophants who've so cowardly bowed down to this indefensible shithead will live in infamy. How was the Obamas as apes "originally intended?" Grow a spine.
@BillCassidy WTF is wrong with you. Grow some fucking balls and maybe come out of all this a hero for standing up. Shame on you.
@BillCassidy That message was DEFINITELY intended by the racist pedophile in chief.
@BillCassidy You are so weak if he raped your wife you would thank him for choosing your family
@BillCassidy The fact that you suck up to the guy who actually diminished the Office of the President by posting this video says everything about your character. Step down. Retire.
